hm2DnsMib.name: hm2DnsMib
hm2DnsMib.contactinfo: Postal: Stuttgarter Str. 45-51 72654 Neckartenzlingen Germany Phone: +49 7127 140 E-mail: hac.support@belden.com
hm2DnsMib.description: Hirschmann DNS MIB for DNS client, DNS client cache and DNS caching server. Copyright (C) 2011. All Rights Reserved.

hm2DnsClientAdminState.name: hm2DnsClientAdminState
hm2DnsClientAdminState.description: The operational status of DNS client. If disabled, no host name lookups will be done for names entered on the CLI and in the configuration of services e.g. NTP.

hm2DnsClientConfigSource.name: hm2DnsClientConfigSource
hm2DnsClientConfigSource.description: DNS client server source. If the value is set to user(1), the variables from hm2DnsClientServerCfgTable will be used. If the value is set to mgmt-dhcp(2), the DNS servers received by DHCP on the management interface will be used. If the value is set to provider(3), the DNS configuration will be taken from DHCP, PPP or PPPoE on the primary WAN link.

hm2DnsClientServerCfgTable.name: hm2DnsClientServerCfgTable
hm2DnsClientServerCfgTable.description: The table that contains the DNS Servers entries configured by the user in the system.

hm2DnsClientServerCfgEntry.name: hm2DnsClientServerCfgEntry
hm2DnsClientServerCfgEntry.description: An entry contains the IP address of a DNS server configured in the system.

hm2DnsClientServerIndex.name: hm2DnsClientServerIndex
hm2DnsClientServerIndex.description: The unique index used for each server added in the DNS servers table.

hm2DnsClientServerAddressType.name: hm2DnsClientServerAddressType
hm2DnsClientServerAddressType.description: Address type for DNS server. Currently, only ipv4 is supported.

hm2DnsClientServerAddress.name: hm2DnsClientServerAddress
hm2DnsClientServerAddress.description: The IP address of the DNS server.

hm2DnsClientServerRowStatus.name: hm2DnsClientServerRowStatus
hm2DnsClientServerRowStatus.description: Describes the status of a row in the table.

hm2DnsClientServerDiagTable.name: hm2DnsClientServerDiagTable
hm2DnsClientServerDiagTable.description: The table that contains the DNS Servers entries configured and used in the system.

hm2DnsClientServerDiagEntry.name: hm2DnsClientServerDiagEntry
hm2DnsClientServerDiagEntry.description: An entry contains the IP address of a DNS server used in the system.

hm2DnsClientServerDiagIndex.name: hm2DnsClientServerDiagIndex
hm2DnsClientServerDiagIndex.description: The unique index used for each server added in the DNS servers table.

hm2DnsClientServerDiagAddressType.name: hm2DnsClientServerDiagAddressType
hm2DnsClientServerDiagAddressType.description: Address type for DNS server used. Currently, only ipv4 is supported.

hm2DnsClientServerDiagAddress.name: hm2DnsClientServerDiagAddress
hm2DnsClientServerDiagAddress.description: The IP address of the DNS server used by the system. The entry can be configured by the provider, e.g. through DHCP client or PPPoE client.

hm2DnsClientDefaultDomainName.name: hm2DnsClientDefaultDomainName
hm2DnsClientDefaultDomainName.description: The default domain name for unqualified hostnames.

hm2DnsClientRequestTimeout.name: hm2DnsClientRequestTimeout
hm2DnsClientRequestTimeout.description: The timeout before retransmitting a request to the server. The timeout value is configured and displayed in seconds.

hm2DnsClientRequestRetransmits.name: hm2DnsClientRequestRetransmits
hm2DnsClientRequestRetransmits.description: The number of times the request is retransmitted. The request is retransmitted provided the maximum timeout value allows this many number of retransmits.

hm2DnsClientCacheAdminState.name: hm2DnsClientCacheAdminState
hm2DnsClientCacheAdminState.description: Enables/Disables DNS client cache functionality of the device.

hm2DnsClientStaticHostConfigTable.name: hm2DnsClientStaticHostConfigTable
hm2DnsClientStaticHostConfigTable.description: Static table of DNS hostname to IP address table

hm2DnsClientStaticHostConfigEntry.name: hm2DnsClientStaticHostConfigEntry
hm2DnsClientStaticHostConfigEntry.description: An entry in the static DNS hostname IP address list. Rows may be created or deleted at any time by the DNS resolver and by SNMP SET requests.

hm2DnsClientStaticHostAddressType.name: hm2DnsClientStaticHostAddressType
hm2DnsClientStaticHostAddressType.description: Address type for static hosts used. Currently, only ipv4 is supported.

hm2DnsClientStaticHostIPAddress.name: hm2DnsClientStaticHostIPAddress
hm2DnsClientStaticHostIPAddress.description: The IP address of the static host.

hm2DnsClientStaticHostStatus.name: hm2DnsClientStaticHostStatus
hm2DnsClientStaticHostStatus.description: Describes the status of a row in the table.

hm2DnsCachingServerAdminState.name: hm2DnsCachingServerAdminState
hm2DnsCachingServerAdminState.description: Enables/Disables DNS caching server functionality of the device.

hm2DnsCacheAdminState.name: hm2DnsCacheAdminState
hm2DnsCacheAdminState.description: Enables/Disables DNS cache functionality of the device. **NOTE: this object is deprecated and replaced by hm2DnsClientCacheAdminState/hm2DnsCachingServerAdminState**.

hm2DnsCacheFlushAction.name: hm2DnsCacheFlushAction
hm2DnsCacheFlushAction.description: Setting this value to action will flush the DNS cache. After flushing the cache, it will be set to noop automatically. **NOTE: this object is deprecated and replaced by hm2DevMgmtActionFlushDnsClientCache/hm2DevMgmtActionFlushDnsCachingServerCache**.

hm2DnsCHHostNameAlreadyExistsSESError.name: hm2DnsCHHostNameAlreadyExistsSESError
hm2DnsCHHostNameAlreadyExistsSESError.description: The host name entered exists and is associated with an IP. The change attempt was canceled.

hm2DnsCHBadIpNotAcceptedSESError.name: hm2DnsCHBadIpNotAcceptedSESError
hm2DnsCHBadIpNotAcceptedSESError.description: The Ip Adress entered is not a valid one for a host. The change attempt was canceled.

hm2DnsCHBadRowCannotBeActivatedSESError.name: hm2DnsCHBadRowCannotBeActivatedSESError
hm2DnsCHBadRowCannotBeActivatedSESError.description: The instance cannot be activated due to compliance issues. Please modify the entry and try again.
